topic.title: Virginia Tech Performing Arts Shows that are Worth It to Attend
topic.shortdesc: Evvy's guide to recurring shows put on at Virginia Tech that you should attend next time you're in the area.

body.p: Blacksburg and Virginia Tech boast hundreds of performing arts clubs and organizations, with countless shows going on throughout the school year. Here are just a few that you should make room in your schedule to attend if you happen to be in Blacksburg when they're going on.
